text: Anthony Price is a professor of philosophy at Birkbeck College, University of London. His research relates to Greek ethics and moral psychology, and contemporary ethics. Price was educated at Winchester College and the University of Oxford. He taught at the University of York from 1972–1995.Anthony Price. Birkbeck College. Retrieved 29 May 2015. ==Selected publications== *Love and Friendship in Plato and Aristotle. (Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1989). *Mental Conflict (London: Routledge, 1995). *Contextuality in Practical Reason. (Oxford: Clarendon Press, 2008). *Virtue and Reason in Plato and Aristotle. (Oxford: Clarendon Press, 2011). == References == == External links == *http://birkbeck.academia.edu/AnthonyPrice Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:English philosophers Category:Academics of Birkbeck, University of London Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:People educated at Winchester College Category:Academics of the University of York
title: Anthony Price (philosopher)
